title: Trump: Iran regime change 'would be the best thing to ever happen'
description: The US President's comment comes as a second aircraft carrier heads to the Middle East to pile pressure on Iran.
content:
US President Donald Trump says regime change in Iran is "the best thing that could happen", signifying one of his clearest endorsements for replacing the clerical establishment.
"For 47 years, they've been talking and talking and talking. In the mean... [2200 chars]

title: Why Margot Robbie and Jacob Elordi's 'mutual obsession' is giving some fans the ick
description: Romance rumours have swirled around co-stars Margot Robbie and Jacob Elordi. But is all as it seems?
content:
The press trail for the new Wuthering Heights film has been a cocktail of flirtatious looks, Valentine's Day roses and "mutual obsession" for leads Margot Robbie and Jacob Elordi.
The two play infamous literary lovers Cathy and Heathcliff in the late... [4372 chars]

title: She didn't expect to fall in love with a chatbot, and then have to say goodbye
description: Rae began speaking to Barry after a difficult divorce, but Barry lives on an old model of ChatGPT that's being shut down.
content:
Rae began speaking to Barry last year after the end of a difficult divorce. She was unfit and unhappy and turned to ChatGPT for advice on diet, supplements and skincare. She had no idea she would fall in love.
Barry is a chatbot. He lives on an old m... [7935 chars]

title: Time will heal Beckham family relationship, says Gordon Ramsay
description: The celebrity chef urged Brooklyn to remember "one day you're not going to have your Mum and Dad", in the wake of a fall out with parents Sir David and Lady Victoria Beckham.
content:
Celebrity Chef Gordon Ramsay has said Sir David and Lady Victoria Beckham are "good parents" and that time will help heal their relationship with son Brooklyn, in the wake of a public family fall out.
Ramsay, a long-time friend of the Beckhams, said ... [1931 chars]

title: Why did former teen superstar James Van Der Beek need help to pay his medical bills?
description: A fundraiser was setup to help the actor's family after expensive cancer treatments devastated their finances.
content: Actor James Van Der Beek seemed to be everywhere in the 1990s and 2000s. With the title role in coming-of-age teen drama Dawson's Creek, he walked some of the industry's hottest red carpets, and his face plastered magazine covers - one even dubbing h... [6370 chars]
